name: The End of Robots
description:
The end of robots is a First Person Shooter videogame, where the main character lives in a world where robots dominate because humans lost the war 200 years ago.  He doesn't know anything about himself (he has been used as a test rat for a long time) , all his life has been inside a cell until one day the cell door opens due to a system error, he will use this chance to end the dominance of the robots and escape.

Each corridor is secured by some robots which won't let you pass to the next area, some of theme will be stronger, try going through all the corridors to destroy the final CPU.

CONTROLS:

-W,A,S,D: Movement of the character.

-Shift: Run.

-ESC: Stop the game.

-Space: Jump

-E: Pickup weapon

-R: Reload Weapon

-Right-click: Zoom weapon

-Left-click:Shoot

-Numbers(1-3): Inventory change

-ESC: Pause/Resume

MADE BY:

  • Sergi Hernandez Cort
  • Àlex Jiménez i Soto
  • Pau Balliu Rodríguez (Miniballi)
  • Valentin-Vasile Goga
  • Kristóf Neumann Csulak
